name: School Programs
description: After-School Classes Enrichment Programs Field Trips Program curriculum is designed around the following skills and topics: - Safety & Knife Skills - Basic Nutrition - Geography & Cuisine - Cooking & Science - Taste Exploration - Fun in the Kitchen Serves: Pre-K to high school. Classes are usually between 45min-1hr long
